2. Strategised innovative marketing techniques for the prospective sponsors of Spring Fest 2018
3. Contacted 250+ companies; successfully pitched to 10 companies including title and co-title sponsors

experience.title: Data analyst intern
experience.description: 1.  Developed a time series based price prediction model using achieving accuracy of 90.6% 2.  Incorporated ARIMA model in daily price prediction of crop prices in multiple markets3.  Real Time Analysis of Tenali village to check the accuracy and feasibility of my model 4.   Cross Validated rolling mean/ random forest imputation for gap filling by performing various       mathematical operations to obtain the final structure of a time series data  5.   Explored Neural Networks, LSTM and ARIMAX to create a dynamic prediction model
experience.description_html: 1. Developed a time series based price prediction model using achieving accuracy of 90.6% 2. Incorporated ARIMA model in daily price prediction of crop prices in multiple markets3. Real Time Analysis of Tenali village to check the accuracy and feasibility of my model 4. Cross Validated rolling mean/ random forest imputation for gap filling by performing various  mathematical operations to obtain the final structure of a time series data 5. Explored Neural Networks, LSTM and ARIMAX to create a dynamic prediction model

experience.title: Operations intern
experience.description: 1.   Modelled the Overall Equipment Effectiveness of Good Day Line with detailed analysis 2.  Performed RCA of Invert Sugar Syrup preparation tank led to 90% spillage reduction3.  Studied Material Consumption Variance Report and suggested measures which led to     30% flavour spillage reduction and 50% laminate wastage reduction for Good Day line 4.  RCA of Good day line contributed in increasing the Labour Power Fuel Efficiency by 25%

honors_and_awards.title: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam Regional Finalist | Hult Prize 2019
honors_and_awards.description: • Qualified among the top 1000 teams selected from more than 200,000 applicants globally • Developed a business plan for the skill development and employment of orphans to cater to the dietary needs of construction workers • The initiative aims to meet the United Nations SDGs of 1 (No Poverty), 2 (Zero Hunger), 3 (Good Health and Well-Being), 4 (Quality Education), 8 (Decent Work and Economic Growth) and 9 (Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure)
